genresAdvancedInfo.name: musica para criancas
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Musica para criancas is a music genre designed specifically for children. It features simple melodies and catchy lyrics that are easy for kids to sing along with. The music often incorporates educational themes, teaching children about numbers, colors, and other basic concepts. Musica para criancas is popular in many countries around the world and is often used in schools and daycare centers to help children learn and have fun at the same time.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
